title: Готовы на всё
overview: Until the age of thirty-two, programmer and stand-up comedian Katya Skvortsova lived her life: a cool job, a favorite hobby, a rented apartment in Moscow, a fancy car on loan. Everything changes when she suddenly finds out that she is about to lose her last chance to become a mother. She has only a few months to find a father for the unborn child. It's not an easy task, especially when you have such a strong character and a sharp tongue.
